DOMPoint.summary: A DOMPoint object represents a 2D or 3D point in a coordinate system; it includes values for the coordinates in up to three dimensions, as well as an optional perspective value. DOMPoint is based on but allows its properties' values to be changed.

remarks.para: In general, a positive x component represents a position to the right of the origin, a positive y component is downward from the origin, and a positive z component extends outward from the screen (in other words, toward the user).
